p: Mice were inoculated intracerebrally with 10 5 PFU of EV-D68 using a 1-ml tuberculin syringe. Mice 10 days old were inoculated with 15 μl, and mice 4 weeks old were inoculated with 50 μl. Five mice were inoculated with each virus isolate or PBS. Mice were observed daily for paralysis or death, and paralyzed mice were sacrificed immediately.
